title: So, about ranked...
body: I Liked playing ranked because its a mode where everyone gives it their all... but right now im at 0 LP of my target rank so im afraid to loose it (Im human, what can I say?[as far as any of you know{muhahahaha}]). According to the video I just saw, preaseason started on the 13th... If I play ranked now and demote what happens?

replies.body: Nothing happens.  If you demote, you will still receive rewards based on the rank that was recorded for you on the 12th.
